g.name: Name: WikiPathways Test: Metabolites and Metabolic Interactions Organism: Homo sapiens
R03571 (Kegg Reaction) [Should link out to Rhea] Note: Doesn't take directionality into account in pathways.
Mappings available from local file and webservice:
Mappings available ONLY from local file

VALID IDENTIFIERS Metabolites with identifiers in properly annotated data sources and valid values. Expected output in backpage: - Full list of identifiers - Links out all working - Correct linkouts between old and new ID structure (for HMDB) - Correct names for compounds

text.tspan: Metabolites with identifiers in properly annotated data
- Correct linkouts between old and new ID structure (for HMDB)

g.name: 1. Double click this Metabolite DataNode and verify that "Glucose" gives search results.

text.tspan: 1. Double click this Metabolite DataNode and verify

g.name: DEPRECATED and/or SECONDARY DATA SOURCES Metabolites with identifiers with deprecated data source strings. Optional output in the Backpage: - full list of identifiers - links out all working Metabolites with identifiers with secondary data source strings. Optional output in the Backpage: - Mapping to primary ID from same datasource - Some mapping to other identifiers - links out all working

text.tspan: Metabolites with identifiers with deprecated data
Metabolites with identifiers with secondary data
- Mapping to primary ID from same datasource

g.name: SPECIAL METABOLITES These metabolites are special in some way, for example, because they constitute a metabolite class. Expected output: - 1:n (directed) mappings to HMDB, ChemSpider, etc

text.tspan: These metabolites are special in some way, for example,
because they constitute a metabolite class.

g.name: Enterobactin (not in HMDB, no mapping to Wikidata due to secondary ChEBI)

text.tspan: no mapping to Wikidata due to secondary ChEBI)

g.name: Enterobactin (part of HMDB, has mapping to Wikidata due to primary ChEBI)

text.tspan: has mapping to Wikidata due to primary ChEBI)

g.name: VALID IDENTIFIERS Reactions with identifiers in properly annotated data sources and valid values (check red coloured interactions). Expected output in backpage: - Original identifiers working - Links out (if available) all working

text.tspan: Reactions with identifiers in properly annotated data
sources and valid values (check red coloured interactions).

g.name: RXN-14819 (MetaCyc shorthand) [Should link out to Rhea and KEGG] Note: can linkout to multiple IDs for the same database, check directionality!

text.tspan: [Should link out to Rhea and KEGG]
Note: can linkout to multiple IDs
for the same database, check directionality!

g.name: GLU6PDEHYDROG-RXN (MetaCyc longhand/EcoCyc) [Should link out to Rhea and EcoCyc] Note: Does take directionality into account

text.tspan: [Should link out to Rhea and EcoCyc]
Note: Does take directionality into account
